title: Valkyrie
description: The Valkyrie: Valerie finds herself caught in the blood thirsty world of the vampire, unable to find her way out. The deeper the darkly sexy Guytano pulls her into his reality, the more ghosts from her own past resurface. Valhalla: Her sworn duty was to collect the souls of brave warriors and return them to Valhalla. Falling in love along the way was not part of the plan.
author: Mandy M. Roth
